    • "They say I'm just talk, but here I am walking!"

    Conor McGregor is the biggest pay-per-view draw in MMA history, having headlined five out of the six highest-selling UFC pay-per-view events. His headline bout with Khabib Nurmagomedov at UFC 229 drew 2.4 million PPV buys, the most ever for an MMA event. Despite the fact that it was his very first boxing match, his fight with Mayweather drew 4.3 million PPV buys in North America, the second most in history.
